snippet: Exxon Mobil had a stronger-than-expected quarterly profit, but production fell 6 percent.
abstract: Exxon Mobil reports quarterly net income of $8.78 billion, or $2.05 a share, up from $6.86 billion, or $1.55 a share, on year earlier; notes that higher prices for its crude oil and natural gas offset a 6 percent drop in production.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil had a stronger-than-expected quarterly profit, but production fell 6 percent.

headline.main: Exxon Reports Strong Profit, Despite Drop in Production
headline.print_headline: Exxon Reports Strong Profit, Despite Drop in Production
